thread.title: Ground News - Champion Chess Player Loses Title After Gross Hotel Room Incident
thread.title_full: Ground News - Champion Chess Player Loses Title After Gross Hotel Room Incident

author: The Spun
title: Ground News - Champion Chess Player Loses Title After Gross Hotel Room Incident
text:
Summary by The Spun 13 July 2022, Berlin: Pieces stand on a chess board at the Werner Ott Open of the Kreuzberg Summer at the Berlin Kreuzberg Chess Club. The International Day of Chess will take place on 20.07.2022. Photo: Andreas Gora/dpa (Photo by Andreas Gora/picture alliance via Getty Images)picture alliance/Getty Images In one of the most wild stories you'll hear this week, Yan Chenglong, the national champion of Chinese chess, has been stripped of his title… Share menu More
